comments: Entertaining and easy class. You will learn basic first aid like bandaging and CPR. You will only take two tests (50% of your grade each). You will also do a power point presentation (and buy first aid supplies for it). The presentation is mandatory but you won\'t get credit(a grade) for it.
This professor loves her job which makes being her student that much more rewarding! this class will teach you life skills that may end up saving your life or an others one day.
she is the best teacher ever! she is clear in explaining the class...

She\'s a wonderful professor and very nice. Her class was a lot of fun and teaches you a lot. I did this to get certified and also for PE credit. I would take her class again. She\'s very helpful and wants to make sure you pass.

P. Curtis was a really good professor, her first aid and safety class was very hands on and helped with teamwork a lot. Shes fun to talk with and very knowledgeable towards her subjects. There\'s a few group projects and a couple tests that\'s it. I highly recommend this class.
good teacher. easy to pass . seems hard at first but it only gets easier.
Lacks passion for what she is teaching. Doesn\'t have much control over the class. Doesn\'t use the textbook enough. Not very organized.

I took First Aid & Safety with her. She is very friendly and gentle with students. Not at all intimidating. A lot of hands-on experience. Practical exams are very easy, since she helps you with them. The only thing to study for are the written tests!
